attributes.action: abolish the asbo and open youth internet cafe's in every area and show to show youths more respect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: abolish the asbo because i dosen't help matters it just encourage more antisocial behaviour and police are using it to target single parent families. show youths more respect they'll give respect back. open youth internet cafe's in every area with no alchol served to give them a place to go instead of on the streets.
